__TOC__

This page groups the possible text-to-speech in GNU/Linux according to a language and their current availability in Ubuntu.

The '''Upstream URLs and related packages info''' have been added at the end.

=== Upstream URLs and related packages info ===
==== Libre or no-cost voice synthesizers ====
* <nowiki>[[http://www.cam.org/~nico/cicero/|Cicero TTS]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[http://espeak.sourceforge.net|eSpeak]]</nowiki> version 1.25. Available in Ubuntu repository .
* <nowiki>[[http://download.gna.org/lliaphon/|Lliaphon]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[http://www.cstr.ed.ac.uk/projects/festival/|Festival]]</nowiki>, available in Ubuntu repository .
* <nowiki>[[http://download.gna.org/lliaphon/franfest/|Festival (in French)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.speech.cs.cmu.edu/flite/|Flite]]</nowiki>, available in Ubuntu repository.
* <nowiki>[[http://freetts.sourceforge.net|FreeTTS]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[http://www.telefonica.net/web2/ircha|IrcHa]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://oralux.org|IrcHa-oralux]]</nowiki> . 
* <nowiki>[[http://tcts.fpms.ac.be/synthesis/mbrola.html|MBROLA]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[ftp://ftp.rakurs.spb.ru/pub/Goga|Multispeech]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[ftp://ftp.rakurs.spb.ru/pub/Goga|RU_TTS]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[http://www.freebsoft.org|Speech Dispatcher]]</nowiki>, available in Ubuntu repository.
* <nowiki>[[http://oralux.org|TTPPORT]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[http://www.ikp.uni-bonn.de/dt/forsch/phonetik/hadifix|TXT2PHO]]</nowiki> .

==== Commercial voice synthesizers ====
The following URLs are given for info: 
* <nowiki>[[https://www.cepstral.com/|Cepstral]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[http://www.fonixspeech.com/pages/dectalk_rt_purchase.php|DECtalk software]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[http://ttsynth.com/|IBM TTS included in TTSynth]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[http://voxin.oralux.net|IBM TTS included in Voxin]]</nowiki> .
* <nowiki>[[http://wizzardsoftware.com/ibm_tts_sdk.php|IBM TTS SDK from Wizzard Software]]</nowiki>, for developers.
